note: My name is Alva Hayes and I am the owner and founder of Miami Tropical Bonsai Inc. We are one of the largest tropical bonsai companies in the United States that dates back to 1987. We are located in the most southern part of Miami Florida in the heart of the Redlands best growing area. We are very proud of the amazing art work we do at Miami Tropical Bonsai.
